---
name: Guide Correction
about: Found an error or outdated info in a guide
title: "[Guide] "
labels: documentation
---

## Which guide?
Link to the guide with the issue.

## What's wrong?
Describe the error or outdated information.

## What's correct?
The accurate information, with a source if possible (e.g., manufacturer docs, firmware changelog).

## Device/firmware version
If relevant, which device and firmware version you're using.
